channel.title: Traveller Worldbuilding
channel.description:
I have been putting a step by step worldbuilding and background generation process together in a series of videos on youtube. Just hoping it might be interesting for members! [You tube Traveller Playlist](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLj-elQi41v8JwzhUi9pSchvEGvzExs2f5)
